description: An ID number that uniquely identifies each observation in the dataset.

An ID number that uniquely identifies the notification in the format {TRIS:####:####:XX:N}, where the first set of digits is the year of the notification, the second set of digits is the notification number, and {XX} is the two-digit code assigned by the Commission to the member state that notified the proposed technical regulation.
An ID number that uniquely identifies the member state that notified the proposed technical regulation to the Commission.
The name of the member state that notified the proposed technical regulation to the Commission.
A multi-letter code assigned by the Commission that uniquely identifies the member state that notified the proposed technical regulation to the Commission.
The date that the Commission opened the case.
The year that the Commission opened the case.
The date that the Commission closed the case.
The year that the Commission closed the case.
A dummy variable indicating whether the notified technical regulation was postponed. Coded {1} if the technical regulation was postponed and {0} otherwise.

A list of the member states and institutions that submitted comments with respect to the proposed technical regulation, separated by commas. Coded {NA} if no member states or institutions submitted opinions.
A count of the number of comments submitted by the third-party member state or institution.
A dummy variable indicating whether the Commission submitted a comment with respect to the notified proposed technical regulation. Coded {1} if the Commission submitted a comment and {0} otherwise.

A list of the member states and institutions that submitted opinions with respect to the proposed technical regulation, separated by commas. Coded {NA} if no member states or institutions submitted opinions.
A count of the number of opinions submitted by the third-party member state or institution.
A dummy variable indicating whether the Commission submitted an opinion with respect to the notified proposed technical regulation. Coded {1} if the Commission submitted an opinion and {0} otherwise.
An ID number that uniquely identifies each observation in the dataset.
The year the member state notified the proposed technical regulation to the Commission.
